title.rendered: Authority Approved Residential Plots in DMIC, Greater Noida

content.rendered:
🚩 Premium Authority Approved Residential Plots in DMIC Greater Noida 🚩

Investment Opportunity in DMIC Region (Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor) near Bodaki Railway Junction

Ready to move residential plots
6% Authority Plots Start At ₹ 45,000 per Sq.mt.
Plot sizes range between 90 square meters to 1000 square meters
Prime location, Registry open, Bank loan available, Free Site Visit.

Why Invest in DMIC Region (Delhi-Mumbai Industrial corridor, Greater Noida)

Greater Noida is shaping up as India’s smartest city, the National Capital Region’s most modern urban development center. As a model of far-sighted planning, Greater Noida is located at the intersection of the Western and Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridors, as well as the gateway to the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor (DMIC).

Connectivity
Among the many benefits of Greater Noida’s state-of-the-art physical and social infrastructure (with quality residential, commercial, recreational, and institutional areas) are-
-✨ Greater Noida is connected to Delhi by an expressway with eight lanes and a length of 25 kilometers.
– ✨Located adjacent to Delhi is Noida, a vibrant satellite town with IT/ITES and electronics industries.
– ✨The Eastern Peripheral Expressway joins NH2 at Faridabad via Ghaziabad and Greater Noida.
– ✨The Eastern and Western Freight Corridors meet at Dadri Railway Junction.
– ✨The state-of-the-art Boraki railway station is to serve the Noida-Greater Noida-Sikandrabad-Bulandshahr.
– ✨As well as the interconnecting green spaces and wide roads that make the area an efficient transport hub, it combines industrial, commercial, institutional, and residential zones uniquely.
– ✨Close to Noida International Airport

USP
– ✨Plots in Greater Noida are available in various sectors like Alpha, Beta, Gamma,& Delta, etc.
– ✨Gated community.
– ✨Plots with demarcation.
– ✨No Maintenance Charges for owning plots in Greater Noida
– ✨Transparent transaction processes in the plots in Greater Noida

For more info or Free Site Visit:
Please Call/Whatsapp @9810319001.
